body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps           This map of the Hopewell Furnace NHS area shows the various routes that can be used to access the park.  It includes the locations of other historic sites and points of interests local to the park. SRN&SHA Illustration       Trail map of Hopewell Furnace, French Creek State Park, Natural Lands Trust, and Crows Nest Preserve.
title: Hopewell Furnace National Historic Site: Maps
